div1.p: Mr George Feazle the bearer has been an inhabitant of this parish for about eight years and has conducted himself as an honest industrious Citizen

Mr Feazle being about to visit the Province of Texas for the purpose of making arrangements to move his family—I therefore recommend Mr Feazle as a good industrious farmer and deserves the Patronage of the Government of the said Province
Parish Judge of Ouachita in the State of Louisiana.
Judge 7th District of the State of Louisiana.
